channel.title: Dwarf on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Dwarf on COTTON

item.title: GhACT_LI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D04G0865 Gene Symbol: GhACT_LI1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Gly65Val substitution in an actin, GhACT_LI1, disrupts cell polarity and F-actin organization resulting in dwarf, lintless cotton plants.

item.title: GhDR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A09G2280 Gene Symbol: GhDR Gene Name: Genome: reference genome TM-1_ZJU_v2.
